definition: sprinkling; hence, a sprinkling (or autumnal showers)

translations.de: besprengung; daher eine Besprengung (oder herbstliche Regenschauer)
translations.el: ψεκασμός, ως εκ τούτου, ένας ψεκασμός (ή φθινοπωρινές βροχές)
translations.es: rociada; de ahí, una rociada (o lluvias otoñales)
translations.fr: l'aspersion ; d'où l'aspersion (ou les averses automnales)
translations.id: percikan; karenanya, percikan (atau hujan musim gugur)
translations.lv: aplaistīšana; no tā - aplaistīšana (vai rudens lietus)
translations.pt: aspersão; portanto, uma aspersão (ou chuvas outonais)
translations.ro: stropire; prin urmare, o stropire (sau ploi de toamnă)
translations.sl: škropljenje; od tod škropljenje (ali jesenski dež)
translations.tr: serpme; dolayısıyla, bir serpme (veya sonbahar yağmurları)
